column1: * 1926 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1929 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1964 - The twelfth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Joy Hill (26 December 1971).
* 2012 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in Australia.
